SEARCH
Package src.repository

Interface ManagerRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
ManagerCsvMapper
public interface ManagerRepository
Repository interface for managing HDBManager entities. Supports CRUD operations abstracted from CSV implementation details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    HDBManager
    findByNric(String nric)
    Searches for a manager by NRIC.
    List<HDBManager>
    loadAll()
    Loads all managers from the persistent data source.
    void
    saveAll(List<HDBManager> managers)
    Saves the entire list of managers to the data source.
    void
    updateManager(HDBManager updatedManager)
    Updates an existing manager by matching NRIC and persisting the new version.

  • Method Details

    • loadAll

      List<HDBManager> loadAll()
      Loads all managers from the persistent data source.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDBManager entries.

    • saveAll

      void saveAll(List<HDBManager> managers)
      Saves the entire list of managers to the data source.
      Parameters:
      managers - A list of managers to persist.

    • findByNric

      HDBManager findByNric(String nric)
      Searches for a manager by NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to search for.
      Returns:
      The matching HDBManager, or null if not found.

    • updateManager

      void updateManager(HDBManager updatedManager)
      Updates an existing manager by matching NRIC and persisting the new version.
      Parameters:
      updatedManager - The modified manager object to persist.
